content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37.0, y=-85.0)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (x=41.0, y=-86.0), (x=37.0, y=-85.0), (x=39.0, y=-85.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (x=40.5, y=-87.5), (x=36.5, y=-86.5), (x=39.5, y=-83.5), (x=34.5, y=-86.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (x=35.5, y=-86.5), (x=35.5, y=-85.5)

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at position(x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
Mining and smelting setup with:
- Burner mining drill at position (x=-28.0, y=-61.0)
- 3 Stone furnaces at positions (x=-27.0, y=-58.0), (x=-23.0, y=-58.0), (x=-21.0, y=-58.0)
- 3 Wooden chests at positions (x=-27.5, y=-59.5), (x=-24.5, y=-58.5), (x=-22.5, y=-55.5)
- 3 Burner inserters at positions (x=-26.5, y=-59.5), (x=-25.5, y=-58.5), (x=-20.5, y=-59.5)
Connected by transport belts

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10.0, y=-59.0)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (x=-10.0, y=-59.0), (x=-8.0, y=-59.0), (x=-6.0, y=-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for item handling
Connected by transport belts

### Smelting Line at position(x=0.0, y=0.0)
Large smelting array consisting of:
- 6 Stone furnaces at positions (x=0.0, y=0.0), (x=2.0, y=0.0), (x=4.0, y=0.0), (x=6.0, y=0.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for input/output
Connected by transport belts

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power generation setup with:
- Steam engine at position (x=4.5, y=20.5)
- Boiler at position (x=-1.5, y=22.0)
- Offshore pump at position (x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Connected by pipe networks for water and steam

### Research Lab
- Single lab for research (position not specified)
Connected to power network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors with pipe connections
- Ensure proper pipe layout between boiler and steam engine
- Clear any blocking pipes before attempting new connections
- Verify fluid flow direction when connecting pipes

### Errors with entity pickup
- Verify entity exists at target position before attempting pickup
- Check if you have the correct coordinates for entity pickup

### Transport belt related errors
- Clear blocked transport belts to allow item flow
- Ensure proper belt connections between components

### Power system errors
- Connect power poles to create a complete electrical network
- Ensure steam engine has proper fluid connections
